name: Lerner
description:
Lerner is a comprehensive education app designed for students in Ghana. With Lerner, students can access a vast library of educational resources, including textbooks, video lectures, and practice quizzes. The app also provides personalized learning plans and tracks student progress to help them stay on track with their studies. In addition, Lerner offers a social platform where students can connect with their peers and educators, fostering a sense of community and support within the education system. Whether students are looking to supplement their in-class learning or seeking a full online education, Lerner is an invaluable tool for academic success.

This is the Beta version of this app- the main one will be released soon after some fixes.
